metadata.feature_description: Performs operations on multiple files or folders simultaneously with progress tracking

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and open My Website folder
steps.expected: Multi-select mode or checkboxes should be visible to select multiple items
steps.actual: No checkboxes, no multi-select toggle, no select-all button found. UI only shows individual file/folder cards with single-item action icons on hover

steps.expected: Multiple items should be selected with visual indication
steps.actual: Ctrl+click navigates into folder instead of multi-selecting. No multi-select behavior observed

steps.action: Hover over file to examine available actions
steps.expected: Bulk operation options or multi-select checkbox should appear
steps.actual: Only single-item actions appear: Edit, Move, Copy, Download, Delete. No checkbox or multi-select option

issues: No multi-select UI element found in Assets panel. Code review confirmed only single-item operations exist in AssetsController.cs and Assets.js

steps.action: Search for bulk delete functionality in UI
steps.expected: Ability to select multiple files and delete them at once
steps.actual: Feature not available. Only single-file delete exists via hover menu on each item

issues: Bulk delete feature does not exist in UI. AssetsController.cs only has DeleteFile and DeleteFolder methods for single items

steps.action: Search for bulk move functionality in UI
steps.expected: Ability to select multiple files and move them to a destination folder at once
steps.actual: Feature not available. Only single-file move exists via hover menu on each item

issues: Bulk move feature does not exist in UI. AssetsController.cs only has MoveFile and MoveFolder methods for single items

steps.action: Search for bulk copy functionality in UI
steps.expected: Ability to select multiple files and copy them to a destination folder at once
steps.actual: Feature not available. Only single-file copy exists via hover menu on each item (files only, not folders)

issues: Bulk copy feature does not exist in UI. AssetsController.cs only has CopyFile method for single files

steps.action: Search for progress tracking UI during operations
steps.expected: Progress bar or indicator should show during bulk operations
steps.actual: No progress tracking UI found because bulk operations do not exist. Single-item operations complete immediately without progress indication

issues: Progress tracking feature does not exist because bulk operations are not implemented

observations: Code review of AssetsController.cs (Services layer) confirmed only single-item API endpoints exist: DeleteFile, DeleteFolder, CopyFile, MoveFile, MoveFolder - no batch/bulk endpoints
Code review of Assets.js (UI layer) confirmed no multi-select state management, no item.selected() array handling, no bulk operation functions
The UI location specified 'Admin > Content > Assets > Multi-Select Mode' does not exist - there is no multi-select mode in the Assets panel
Individual items have action icons (Edit, Move, Copy, Download, Delete) that appear on hover, but these operate on single items only
The feature 'Bulk Operations' as described appears to be planned functionality that was never implemented in this extension
